overview: In a small green room painted with murals of nudes and an octopus-grabbing-a-boat scene, with rounded marble stairs on one side and hard red leather couches around the walls, Gino Francesco (metal laurel leaf crown, clean shaven, blue-strap sandals, bowl haircut, small tattoo on right shoulder blade) sucks Claudio Antonelli (Fu Manchu mustache, spiky tattoo around upper left arm, big tattoo on right deltoid, silvery boots) on a small couch; Claudio sits on Gino; on a long couch, Gino tops Claudio in missionary position, as Austin Rogers (reddish cloak) enters with a tray of cups on the stairs; Austin withdraws; Gino tops Antonio sideways kneeling on a small couch next to a long green radiator; Antonio sucks Gino; Gino j.o.'s on Claudio.
title: The Gladiators 3
